alert.note: Alert for Logan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 11:03PM CDT until August 03 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM MDT/1130 PM CDT/ FOR NORTHERN WALLACE...SOUTHWESTERN THOMAS... NORTHWESTERN LOGAN AND SHERMAN COUNTIES... At 1002 PM MDT/1102 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Goodland to 10 miles northwest of Winona, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Goodland, Brewster, Ruleton, Winona and Edson. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 2 and 41. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
